name: Node Inspector
semantic_context: List and inspect all available n8n nodes
natural_language_description: 这是 Node Inspector 节点。主要用于: List and inspect all available n8n nodes

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: listNodes
available_options: List Nodes (值: listNodes) - Get a list of all available nodes

filter.name: filter
filter.description: Filter which types of nodes to include
filter.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter | 作用: Filter which types of nodes to include | 默认值: all
available_options: All Nodes (值: all) - Include all nodes (core, community, and custom)
Community Nodes Only (值: community) - Include only community nodes
